blogPost.excerpt: Discovering & outreaching new leads through LinkedIn has never been easier than with Skylead. With our brand new email & hyper-image personalization features, you’ll be able to take communication to a whole new level and skyrocket your sales processes.
blogPost.body: Discovering & outreaching new leads through LinkedIn has never been easier than with Skylead. With our brand new email & hyper-image personalization features, you’ll be able to take communication to a whole new level and skyrocket your sales processes.
blogPost.title: Skylead - Leverage LinkedIn & email to generate leads better than ever
blogPost.author: Nichole Elizabeth DeMeré

localize.description: 通过LinkedIn发现和拓展新的潜在客户从来没有像Skylead这样容易。凭借我们全新的电子邮件和超图像个性化功能，您将能够将沟通提升到一个全新的水平，并使您的销售流程飞速发展。
localize.tagline: 利用LinkedIn和电子邮件产生比以往更好的潜在客户。

localize.description: 通過LinkedIn發現和拓展新的潛在客戶從來沒有像Skylead這樣容易。憑藉我們全新的電子郵件和超圖像個性化功能，您將能夠將溝通提升到一個全新的水平，並使您的銷售流程飛速發展。
localize.tagline: 利用LinkedIn和電子郵件產生比以往更好的潛在客戶。
